properties.entry: SELECT C.ID,C.FIRST_NAME,C.SECOND_NAME,C.LAST_NAME,C.SECOND_LAST_NAME, C.AGE,C.RFC,C.HOME_PHONE,C.CELL_PHONE,C.EMAIL,C.ACTIVE, CA.STREET,CA.STREET_NUMBER,CA.NEIGHBOURHOOD,CA.ID_STATE FROM KYC_CUSTOMER C INNER JOIN KYC_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS CA ON C.ID = CA.ID_CUSTOMER ORDER BY C.ID

SELECT C.ID,C.FIRST_NAME,C.SECOND_NAME,C.LAST_NAME,C.SECOND_LAST_NAME, C.AGE,C.RFC,C.HOME_PHONE,C.CELL_PHONE,C.EMAIL,C.ACTIVE, CA.STREET,CA.STREET_NUMBER,CA.NEIGHBOURHOOD,CA.ID_STATE FROM KYC_CUSTOMER C INNER JOIN KYC_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS CA ON C.ID = CA.ID_CUSTOMER WHERE C.ID = ? and C.ACTIVE = true

SELECT C.ID,C.FIRST_NAME,C.SECOND_NAME,C.LAST_NAME,C.SECOND_LAST_NAME, C.AGE,C.RFC,C.HOME_PHONE,C.CELL_PHONE,C.EMAIL,C.ACTIVE, CA.STREET,CA.STREET_NUMBER,CA.NEIGHBOURHOOD,CA.ID_STATE FROM KYC_CUSTOMER C INNER JOIN KYC_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS CA ON C.ID = CA.ID_CUSTOMER WHERE C.RFC= ? and C.ACTIVE = true

SELECT C.ID,C.FIRST_NAME,C.SECOND_NAME,C.LAST_NAME,C.SECOND_LAST_NAME, C.AGE,C.RFC,C.HOME_PHONE,C.CELL_PHONE,C.EMAIL,C.ACTIVE, CA.STREET,CA.STREET_NUMBER,CA.NEIGHBOURHOOD,CA.ID_STATE FROM KYC_CUSTOMER C INNER JOIN KYC_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS CA ON C.ID = CA.ID_CUSTOMER WHERE C.FIRST_NAME = ? AND COALESCE(C.SECOND_NAME,'') = ? AND C.LAST_NAME = ? AND SECOND_LAST_NAME = ?
